title: WHICH ONE TO COSPLAY (female): Warring Kingdoms Nidalee or Heartseeker Ashe?
body:
WK Nidalee will be accompanied by a Panda Annie. 

Heartseeker Ashe will be accompanied by a Sweetheart Annie

replies.body: The skin with the least amount of clothing.
WK Nid, mainly because it is new and I don't think many people will have done it/will be doing it
